entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Type.GetEnumValuesAsUnderlyingType #72498
  • [NativeAOT] The Finalize method is not preserved via reflection #72494
  • [API Proposal]: Provide a result returning Parallel.ForEachAsync overload #72489
  • JSImportGenerator is introducing analyzer source-build prebuilts #72486
  • [wasm-ep] End-to-end workflow for profiled AOT using EventPIpe #72481
    8.0.0
  • WebSockets over HTTP/1.1 with HttpClient fails #72476
  • NonBacktracking engine is not producing the same match as other engines for multiline cases with empty matches #72470
    7.0.0
  • Randomly occurring ExecutionEngineException seemingly caused by GC #72466
    7.0.0
  • normal-microsoft.extensions.configuration.binder.tests work item #72465
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] `ConfigurationBinderTests.CanBindNonInstantiatedSortedSetWithSomeValues` failing when tests are trimmed #72461
    7.0.0
  • JIT/opt/ValueNumbering/TypeTestFolding fails on mono LLVM AOT #72460
    7.0.0
  • New Socket.Select TimeSpan-based overload is broken for Timeout.InfiniteTimeSpan #72458
    7.0.0
  • ArgumentNullException in dotnet.6.0.7.hr41unoldr.js #72457
  • Windows Server 2022 - Setting affinity in .NET 6 application errors #72441
  • Align Mono and coreclr behavior for thiscall without arguments #72438
  • [wasm][wbt] - Microsoft.Playwright.PlaywrightException : net::ERR_UNSAFE_PORT #72436
  • When building coreclr in M1 OSX (arm64), the symbols of corprof artifacts is in amd64 NOT arm64 and that causes build error when building a dotnet profiler for m1 environment #72432
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.SpanTests.ReadOnlySpanTests.TestMatchTwo_Char #72427
  • msbuild Publish fails with Error: Invalid directory size. #72425
  • System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86.Bmi2 - ADCX and ADOX instructions missing. #72423
    Future
  • Test failure file_io.GetSystemTimeAsFileTime.test1 #72421
  • Test failure profiler/elt/slowpatheltleave/slowpatheltleave.sh #72420
  • Increase NativeAOT testing when NativeAOT is changed #72419

Closed

  • Android: Next Steps #7556
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'i < BitSetTraits::GetSize(env)' in during 'Redundant branch opts' #71599
    7.0.0
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.Tests causing OSX queue backup from uploading dump #65000
    7.0.0
  • Test Failure：System.Net.Sockets.Tests.TelemetryTest.EventSource_SocketConnectsRemote_LogsConnectStartStop #55382
    7.0.0
  • OptionsCache cached an Exception #57496
    7.0.0
  • Unable to run .NET 5.0 service as a different user #51269
    7.0.0
  • `UpgradeToRegexGeneratorCodeFixer` crashes with `InvalidCastException` #72047
    7.0.0
  • Test failure Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Tests.HostTests.CreateDefaultBuilder_SecretsDoesReload #68453
    7.0.0
  • CreateDefaultBuilder_SecretsDoesReload test failed in CI #48696
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Could not load ICU data. UErrorCode: 2 Abortado #71275
  • SDL signoff requirements - please enable additional C/C++ compiler warnings #66154
    7.0.0
  • TypeConverter.ConvertFrom does not support trimming but is not attributed as such. #72006
  • "coreclr Pri0 Runtime Tests Run windows arm64 check" timeouts #72182
  • Winmm error with latest version of System.Speech package #69776
  • [API Proposal]: Efficiently matching multiple strings. #69682
    Future
  • `Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.Physical.Tests` test fails with `System.UnauthorizedAccessException` #56810
    Future
  • Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.Physical.PhysicalFilesWatcher.RaiseChangeEvents takes down process on an IO exception #71003
    7.0.0
  • Confusing message on Http timeout #67505
    7.0.0
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SyncHttpHandler_DiagnosticsTest.SendAsync_SuppressedGlobalStaticPropagationEnvVar failing in CI #72428
    7.0.0
  • system.net.quic.functional.tests failing with stack buffer overflow #72429
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Buffers.Tests.ReadOnlySequenceTests<Byte> #70844
    7.0.0
  • C#: Different output for ToString("X2") #72426
  • `GC\Features\SustainedLowLatency\scenario` fails #65797
    7.0.0
  • System.Net.Http.ContentLengthReadStream should provide the length of the stream #71190
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Default Constructor for String #72468
  • MultipartFormDataContent potentially not compliant with RFC 6266 and RFC 7578 #72447
    7.0.0
  • runtime-libraries stress-ssl pipeline is constantly failing #72340
    7.0.0
  • CG2 runtime crash in JIT\Regression\JitBlue\Runtime_34170\Runtime_34170\Runtime_34170.cmd #53560
    7.0.0

    7.0.0

    7.0.0
  • ReadyToRun compilation of WinUI projects fails under .NET 6 #58035
    7.0.0
  • .NET Core - code is very slow when run on a computer with many cores #54276
    7.0.0
  • HttpStress is not running on Windows in CI #72096
    7.0.0
  • Run test baseservices/TieredCompilation/BasicTest_QuickJitOn_R2r/BasicTest_QuickJitOn_R2r.sh #59612
    7.0.0

    7.0.0

    7.0.0

    7.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Methodical/eh/basics/trythrowcatchfinally_d/trythrowcatchfinally_d.sh #64504
    7.0.0
  • Stack overflow and Consistency check failed: FAILED: m_crawl.pFrame->IsTransitionToNativeFrame() in System.Runtime.Tests #57807
    7.0.0
  • Plagued with 'System.OutOfMemoryException' errors in .NET 7 Preview 4 #70718
    7.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices\\exceptions\\regressions\\Dev11\\154243\\dynamicmethodliveness\\dynamicmethodliveness.cmd #59449
    7.0.0
  • Test timeout: JIT\\Regression\\CLR-x86-JIT\\V2.0-Beta2\\b426654\\b426654\\b426654.cmd #50615
    7.0.0

    7.0.0
  • VS2022 Blazor Debugger doesn't show the generic types in a method #71553
    7.0.0
  • Open Generics mixed with Closed Generics in dependency injection #64995
    Future
  • [iOS/tvOS] System.IO.Compression.Tests.ZipFile_ZipArchive_Extract.ExtractToDirectoryExtension_Unicode on devices #60582
    7.0.0

    7.0.0
  • Serialization issue in .NET 6 Blazor after publishing #68826
    7.0.0
  • Reuse JsonSerializerOptions when used with JsonSerializerContext #64025
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: System.Text.Json serialization callback context #59892
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: JsonBoolHandling #61097
    7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Developers have QUIC library so they can develop their own protocols on top #57601
    7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Developers can build libraries for HTTP/3 to meet their client/server needs (.NET 7) #57600
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: IStructEnumerable<T, TEnumerator> #71297
  • Test failure: TestLoopbackAsync #56087
    7.0.0
  • Skip() on IReadOnlyList needlessly enumerates skipped items #72424
  • QUIC: DefaultStreamErrorCode and DefaultCloseErrorCode default values cause error #72160
    7.0.0
  • iOS: crash when profiling dotnet-podcasts #71492
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Net.Security.Tests.ServerAsyncAuthenticateTest.ServerAsyncAuthenticate_EachSupportedProtocol_Success(protocol: Ssl3) #67076
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'argsToReverse' in 'Program:<Main>$(System.String[])' during 'Importation' #71874
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAot] Fixing Resources.Reader and ComponentModel tests #72497
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Support for RequiresAttributeMismatch testing #72496
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] ThisCall with no arguments is invalid #72495
    area-Interop-mono, 7.0.0
  • Warn on trimming with COM hosting (built-in COM support) enabled #72493
    area-Host
  • Fix PAL GetFullPathNameA test3 #72492
    area-PAL-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Re-enable test that passes locally #72491
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Adding rust tests for match boundaries #72490
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Move UnsupportedOSPlatform from class to methods for MD5 and HMACMD5 #72488
    area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • Remove hard-coded RunAnalyzer property in JSImportGenerator #72487
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Fix Configuration Binder Test with WASM and Trimming #72485
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 7.0.0
  • [libs] Add EventSourceSupport to CountersTest #72484
    area-System.Runtime.Caching

    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0

    arch-wasm, area-Tracing-mono
  • Update recursive resource load message #72480
    area-System.Resources
  • [mono][aot] Avoid an assert when encoding fnptr classes. #72479
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix for m_alignpad == 0 assertion failure #72475
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Update /// comments for new InteropServices APIs #72473
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • port BitArray.And, Or, Xor and Not to Vector<T> #72471
    area-System.Collections
  • [iOS] Use different tvOS helix queue for PR's #72467
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Consume renamed ApiCompat.Task package #72464
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add missing System.Net docs #72459
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Use `GetTempPath2W` if available. #72452
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Update NuGet reference versions #72451
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Additional tests for 71619 #72449
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • #53624 enable test suites in maccatalyst #72445
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Mark b311420 test GC Stress incompatible on all platforms #72444
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • WIP: Testing mono llvmfullaot with interpreter as a fallback instead of GSHAREDVTs #72443
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Update llvm-libunwind from v9.0.0 to v14.0.6 #72442
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Rename [RegexGenerator] to [Regex] #72434
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Handle blittable byref returns in built-in marshalling #72433
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Ensure prerequisites are installed on the perf pipeline #72431
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fixes a key partner Watson bucketing for Linux coredumps #72417
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.9

Merged

  • Don't run optJumpThreading when fgCurBBEpochSize != (fgBBNumMax + 1) #72440
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert tar header struct to class #72472
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0

    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

  • Add missing docs for PeriodicTimer #72454

    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Clean up of tests from V1/V2 marshaller shape split #72392
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Working Windows image for HttpStress and SslStress #72271
    area-System.Net.Http

    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Avoid using type info from GDV guesses during import #72376
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expand API documentation of contract customization APIs. #72388
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Block Matrix4x4CreateFromAxisAngleTest test on NativeAOT #72437
    area-System.Numerics
  • Remove unnecessary call to Path.GetTempPath #72414
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing

    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add an area-owners.json file. Remove unused area. Format MD table. #72309
    area-Meta, 7.0.0

Updated
